TransactionStateContext.DepositState: Users deposit Ether via the addToBalance function, which updates their balance in userBalance mapping.
TransactionStateContext.WithdrawalState: Users withdraw Ether via the withdrawBalance function, transferring funds out and updating the balance to zero.

ExternalInteractions.Description: Transfers Ether between users and the contract's address.
InteractionPoints: Ether transferred to contract during addToBalance (payable function).
Ether transferred back to user in withdrawBalance function.
